feed.title: HeyForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.11
entry.content:
New Features

  • Add S3 to store static files (#64)
  • Replace CDN resource flag-icon with npm package (#84)
  • Add language switcher to left sidebar
  • Add Polish language translation by @anarion80 (https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/88)

Improvement

  • Refactor form analytic API (#117 #119)
  • Fix parse email templates content error (#95)
  • Fix form optional field validation error (#91)
  • Fix uploaded file URL issue caused by non-Latin characters in filename (#120)
  • Fix form embedding webpage error (#123)

New Contributors

  • @anarion80 made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/88
  • @bperreault made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/113
  • @Leopere made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/114

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.10...v0.0.11

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.12
entry.content:
Improvement

  • Fix incorrect rendererData issue in form route (#127)
  • Fix form redirection doesn't work issue (#118)

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.11...v0.0.12

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor app seeders migration https://github.com/heyform/heyform/commit/d643804712b4be334f3b522e14751b8f34fd73bc
  • Include hidden fields in integration email by @fkammer in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/133
  • Include hidden fields in csv export by @fkammer in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/134
  • Include hidden fields in integration webhook by @fkammer in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/135
  • Added a link for Alibaba Cloud Deployment by @endless-learner in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/136

New Contributors

  • @fkammer made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/133
  • @endless-learner made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/136

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.12...v0.0.13

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.14
entry.content:
Improvement

  • Fix the issue that HTTP 500 when submitting a form with "Question group" containing a "File upload" #138
  • Fix the issue that clicking Next Page in Submissions does not advance to a new page for >30 submissions #129
  • Fix the issue that address question type crashes #140

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.13...v0.0.14

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.15
entry.content:
Improvement

  • Fix saving first hidden_field by @SiebelsTim in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/150

New Contributors

  • @SiebelsTim made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.14...v0.0.15
